item.title: Hank Williams - Your Cheating Heart
item.description:
Your cheating heart
will make you weep
You’ll cry and cry
and try to sleep
But sleep
won’t come
The whole night
through
Your cheating heart
will tell on you
When tears come down
like falling rain
You’ll toss around
and call my name
You’ll walk the floor
the way I do
Your cheating heart
will tell on you-

Your cheating heart
will fine someday
And crave love
you threw away
The time will come
when you’ll be blue
Your cheating heart
will tell on you
When tears come down
like falling rain
You’ll toss around
and call my name
You’ll walk the floor
the way I do
Your cheating heart
will tell on you-
